bibl.title: Habent sua fata fragmenta: "Donum Borgianum". [En anglais.]

series.title: Österreichische Akademie der Wissenschaften. Philosophisch-historische Klasse. Kommission für antike Rechtsgeschichte. Papyrologica Vindobonensia.

bibl.title: Akten des 23. Internationalen Papyrologenkongresses. Wien, 22.-28. Juli 2001
bibl.author: LITINAS, Nikos

bibl.note: Edition of a fragment of the Charta Borgiana given as a personal present of Cardinal Stefano Borgia to a Portuguese dignitary and not published by Nikolas Schow. Joins at the top left of the first fragment of CB (= S.B. I, 5124, fr. I, coll. i-ii). - Pp. 403-405: Appendix 1. The entries in CB as in ed. princ.; - 405: Appendix 2. Some corrections on CB, checked on photos.
